ing: 1 (16 ounce) jar reduced fat peanut butter
n: Light and Fluffy Peanut Butter Pie
des: "Light, fluffy, and creamy peanut butter tatse without all the fat.  So easy - just whip, chill, and serve! If you like, garnish this pie with low-fat whipped topping."
ins: In a medium mixing bowl, combine peanut butter, confectioners' sugar, and cream cheese. Whip until smooth and fluffy. Spoon mixture into graham cracker crust and chill 2 hours before serving.
